entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.6°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: 0.6°C

Humidity: 100 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening then snow. Snow mixed with rain late this evening and after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:19 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:19 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:19 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
